descriptionHtml:
Finally decided to share him c: 

Well Okay.He is already LvL 5 and is located in dragons reach..It\'s pretty at the beginning..You will need to check the quests and stuff :} Couldnt find a earlier one sorry!
------------------------------
How to install!:
Copy into: ...\\my documents\\my games\\skyrim\\saves.
And you\'re done (:

Requirements:

The Ashen Race:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583&navtag=file/images.php?id=8583&tab=3

a bit more feminine faces for males:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11387&navtag=file/images.php?id=11387&tab=3

High Res Warpaint and Dirtmaps for Men:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4283

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

Optional(If you want him to be similar to how he looks in my game C: )

Native Inspired Tattoo Texture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17280


-----------------------------------
Thanks to all the creators of those awesome mods above ^^ (not including myself ofc. XD)

Hope you will enjoy playing around with him ;D
author: xXBabyDreXx
